title: IBACnetStaticObjectBase (Interface)
text:
INTERFACE PUBLIC IBACnetStaticObjectBase EXTENDS
IBACnetObjectBase
Any BACnet-Object inserted as CODESYS-Device is reflected by an FB derived by this FB-Type.
It establishes zhe correct initialization of the BACnet-Properties using the CODESYS-Devices Parameters.

ParentBACnetServer
